name: PolyRace (itch)
description:
PolyRace is a fast-paced futuristic 3d racing game with a procedural level generator.

Choose between 4 different hovercrafts with each of them having its own physic properties and a unique sci-fi hull. Run on generated terrains shaped with valleys, hills and mountains, mixing long straight lines and narrow curves while paying attention to your energy, required to run, boost and shield your hovercraft.

=== Features ===

* Integrated random track generator (using procedural algorithm) with three difficulty levels and four landscape environment: desert, continental, arctic and exoplanet.

* Turn by turn multiplayer. Race against your opponent ghost.

* Three game modes: Random, Challenge and Race of the day

* Two race modes: Time attack and endless

* Four hovercrafts with different physics

* Put yourself at risk if you want to be the first and use a maximum of your energy

* Replay mode with multiple cameras (chase, spectator, top and onboard).

* Multiple chase and onboard camera in race mode

* Support of keyboard and gamepad.

* Fast-paced music.
